title: What is the range for NFC transfers?
answer:
NFC is a short-range, high-frequency wireless communication technology. NFC enables contactless data transfer between electrical devices in close proximity of each other. 

 The NFC range varies between products. For effective use, it is recommended that you press other electronic devices against the back of your phone to transfer data. The distance between devices should not exceed 2 cm.
keywords: Near Field Communication, NFC, range, transfer range
